headline: The Banks Are Up Against the Digital Asset Industry in a DC Policy Battle, and Crypto‚Äôs Been ‚ÄòWinning,‚Äô Says Custodia Bank CEO
summary: The CEO of Custodia Bank, a US financial institution specializing in cryptocurrencies, says passing crypto legislation in the US has been a pitched battle between traditional banks and the digital asset industry. The House of Representatives this week passed the CLARITY Act, the GENIUS Act and the Anti-CBDC Surveillance State Act. But only the GENIUS Act, which establishes the federal rules for stablecoins, has so far cleared both chambers of Congress. In an interview on CNBC, Custodia CEO Caitlin Long says that getting the crypto bills approved has been ‚Äúan ugly sausage-making process‚Äù that clashes traditional finance against the digital asset industries. ‚ÄúYou‚Äôve got some pretty powerful interests here. The banks are up against the crypto industry, and so far, the crypto industry has been winning.‚Äù Long says she is optimistic that the crypto industry has the upper hand because of the financial challenges that the US faces. ‚ÄúWhat problem is the government trying to solve? The US has enormous fiscal deficits and needs to have demand for purchasers of US Treasuries, and the crypto market would never have gotten permission, [though] some of us tried. Folks who went around the regulators and created entire new markets of buyers for US Treasuries, that‚Äôs what Congress and the Trump administration are trying to enable here.‚Äù Follow us on X , Facebook and Telegram Don't Miss a Beat ‚Äì Subscribe to get email alerts delivered directly to your inbox Check Price Action Surf The Daily Hodl Mix Disclaimer: Opinions expressed at The Daily Hodl are not investment advice. headline: U.S. House of Representatives Sends GENIUS Act to Trump To Sign Into Law, Passes Two Other Bills To Conclude Crypto Week
summary: The U.S. House of Representatives is closing the proclaimed Crypto Week with a bang, passing three monumental digital asset regulation bills. Yesterday, on a vote of 206-102, the Republican-led U.S. House passed the GENIUS Act, sending the country‚Äôs first crypto-specific regulations bill to the desk of the sitting President. GENIUS is an acronym meaning ‚ÄúGuiding and Establishing National Innovation for US Stablecoins.‚Äù The bill purports to seek to improve consumer protection, transparency, marketing restrictions and regulatory oversight for the burgeoning stablecoin market, estimated to be worth $250 billion. Furthermore, the House passed the CLARITY and the Anti-CBDC Surveillance State Acts by similar margins, sending both bills to the Senate for further consideration. The CLARITY Act seeks to establish a clear regulation framework for crypto and other digital assets. The Anti-CBDC Act would prohibit Fed banks from issuing central bank digital currencies (CBDCs). Though the GENIUS Act easily passed the House, prominent Republican Senator Josh Hawley has been vocal and adamant in breaking party lines on the bill, urging his fellow Republicans to vote against it. ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs a huge giveaway to Big Tech. It allows these tech companies to issue stablecoins without any kind of controls. I don‚Äôt see why we would do that.‚Äù Trump is expected to sign the GENIUS Act into law soon. headline: Analyst Who In 2013 Said ‚ÄúBuy Bitcoin Even For One Dollar‚Äù Announced His Latest Predictions For BTC
summary: YouTuber Jeremy DaVinci, a well-known figure in the cryptocurrency world, an early Bitcoin investor, and a self-proclaimed billionaire, made ambitious predictions about the BTC price. DaVinci said that Bitcoin will not fall below the $100,000 level at some point in the future. According to a statement on YouTube, DaVinci made his point with a striking post on the X (formerly Twitter) platform. In the visual, inspired by the Hollywood film ‚ÄúTroy,‚Äù a child's words, ‚ÄúI think Bitcoin is very dangerous,‚Äù are met with the response of Brad Pitt's character, Achilles, ‚ÄúThis is why no one will remember your name.‚Äù DaVinci shared the image with the caption, ‚ÄúOne day, we will never see BTC under $100,000 again.‚Äù Related News: White House Cryptocurrency Executive Bo Hines Announced: ‚ÄúTrump Will Sign The Decision That Will Change The Fate Of Cryptocurrencies Today‚Äù Earlier this week, DaVinci also suggested that Bitcoin could reach $500,000 before the end of the decade. Responding to a follower's question, the renowned investor stated that BTC would also be a significant tool for capital reinvestment in the future. Stating that he sees Bitcoin as an extremely strong asset in the long term, DaVinci stated that $100,000 could become a new base level. *This is not investment advice. headline: Trader Says Dogecoin Forming Bullish Pattern That Could Lead to 76% Rally, Maps Path Forward for Bitcoin
summary: A closely followed crypto analyst says that the top memecoin Dogecoin ( DOGE ) may be primed for an explosive move to the upside. In a new thread, crypto trader Ali Martinez tells his 141,400 followers on the social media platform X that DOGE may be forming a bullish reversal pattern on the daily chart and potentially increase more than 76% from its current value. ‚ÄúDogecoin seems to be shaping a double bottom pattern, targeting $0.42!‚Äù Source: Ali Martinez/X The analyst also says that DOGE needs to break through a key resistance level at $0.36 to maintain the uptrend based on Dogecoin‚Äôs URPD, or UTXO (unspent transaction output) realized price distribution, which keeps track of the number of existing coins that last moved within a given price range. ‚ÄúAs Dogecoin overcomes the $0.20 resistance barrier, the next key hurdle to watch is $0.36!‚Äù Source: Ali Martinez/X DOGE is trading for $0.238 at time of writing, up 12.5% in the last 24 hours. Next up, the analyst says Bitcoin may increase more than 12% of its current value if BTC can hold $121,000 as support. ‚ÄúA daily close above $121,000 could pave the way for Bitcoin to rally toward $132,000!‚Äù Source: Ali Martinez/X He also says Bitcoin is facing a key resistance key level at $121,500 based on BTC‚Äôs heatmap of leveraged positions. ‚ÄúTraders keep shorting Bitcoin, building a big liquidation wall at $121,500!‚Äù Source: Ali Martinez/X Lastly, the analyst says that the volume of large Bitcoin transactions is signaling market bullishness, reaching a new high over the past three months. ‚ÄúThe total volume of large Bitcoin transactions surpassed $133.55 billion!‚Äù Source: Ali Martinez/X Bitcoin is trading for $117,770 at time of writing.
